import theme from "../store/context"; import { data } from "./data" import style from './MainBox1.module.css' import { useContext, useState } from "react" import Header from './Header' function MainBox1() { const [dark, setDark] = useState('dark') const ctx = useContext(MyContext) console.log(ctx, dark); const dataMap = data.map(ev => (

Name: {ev.name}

Price: {ev.price}

{ev.description}

)) return (
{dataMap}
) } export default MainBox1
